awards.text: Nominated for 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 nomination.

fullplot: An alternate scientific history, in which dragons were real and lived on this earth, is imagined in this fantasy docudrama. Dr. Tanner, a modern but renegade scientist, hopes to prove the existence of the creatures by discovering paleontologic evidence.

title: Dragons: A Fantasy Made Real
